text: Today and Tomorrow () is a 1912 Hungarian silent movie directed by Michael Curtiz (who also stars) and starring Gyula Abonyi, Gyula Szalay, Guyla Fehér, Artúr Somlay, Antal Hajdu. ==Other websites== * * Category:1912 movies Category:Hungarian silent movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Curtiz
title: Today and Tomorrow (1912 movie)
